item.title: Special Characters
item.description:
Special characters in strings are: \ (Backslash) : an escape character 
 : specifies new line within the string 	 : adds a tab print("My name is Marshmallow. \ I wag my tail when I'm happy. \ I bark at speedy motorcycles \ and unwanted visitors.") print("
") print("\n") print("My name is Marshmallow.
I wag my tail when I'm happy.
I bark at speedy motorcycles
and unwanted visitors.
